resources.string: You need to access the "Camera" to take pictures, please go to "App Information -> Permissions" to grant it!
Access to the album requires access to “External Storage“, please go to “Application Information -> Permissions“to grant it!
Selecting files requires "External Storage" permissions, please go to "Application Information -> Permissions" to grant it!
Positioning requires "location" permission, please go to "application information -> permissions" to grant it!
Failed to get the selected album picture
Unable to dial, please confirm your SIM card status
